summary: A band of pirates and a group of bandits fight to catch a gray whale that has swallowed a royal stamp.
cast: Nam-gil Kim|Son Ye-jin|Hae-Jin Yoo|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Kim Tae-Woo|Cheol-min Park|Kim Won-Hae|Dal-hwan Jo|Shin Jeong-geun|Sulli Choi|Yi-Kyeong Lee|Dal-su Oh|Nae-sang Ahn|Hie-bong Jo|Sung-hwa Jung|Kwang-Hyun Joo|Yoon Chan Kim|Byeong-hee Yoon
title: Hae-jeok: Ba-da-ro gan san-jeok
